contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionarypar|rebirth}} '''Rebirth''' may refer to: {{TOCright}} ==Spiritual== * [[Reincarnation]], the migration of a deceased person's spirit or consciousness to a newborn body ** [[Rebirth (Buddhism)]] * [[Regeneration (theology)]] ** [[Baptism]], a Christian ritual representing spiritual cleansing ** [[Born again (Christianity)]] ** [[Resurrection of the dead]] * [[Dying god|Resurrection deity]] the cycle of life, death and rebirth ==Music== * [[Rebirth Brass Band]] * [[Rebirth (Angra album)|''Rebirth'' (Angra album)]] * [[Rebirth (Jimmy Cliff album)|''Rebirth'' (Jimmy Cliff album}]] * [[Rebirth (Gackt album)|''Rebirth'' (Gackt album)]] * [[Rebirth (Lil Wayne album)|''Rebirth'' (Lil Wayne album)]] * [[Rebirth (Jennifer Lopez album)|''Rebirth'' (Jennifer Lopez album)]] * [[Rebirth (Pain album)|''Rebirth'' (Pain album)]] * [[Rebirth (Keith Sweat album)|''Rebirth'' (Keith Sweat album)]] * [[ReBirth (Masami Okui album)|''ReBirth'' (Masami Okui album)]] * ''[[The Rebirth]]'', an album by Bobby Valentino * [[The Rebirth (band)]], a Los Angeles soul band * Rebirth, record label which [[The March Violets]] have recorded under * "Rebirth", a song by Bone Thugs-n-Harmony on the album ''[[Uni5: The World's Enemy]]'' * "Rebirth", a song by Gorgoroth on the album ''[[Quantos Possunt ad Satanitatem Trahunt]]'' ==Other uses== * [[Rebirth: When Everyone Forgot!]] novel by [[Thomas Calvert McClary]] * [[Rebirth (manhwa)|''Rebirth'' (manhwa)]] * [[Rebirth (film)|''Rebirth'' (film)]], a 2011 Japanese drama film * ''[[Project_Rebirth#Rebirth|Rebirth]]'', a 2011 documentary film * [[Rebirth (Death Note episode)|"Rebirth" (''Death Note'' episode)]] * [[Rebirth (Futurama)|"Rebirth" (''Futurama'')]], a television episode * [[ReBirth RB-338]], a software synthesizer * [[Rebirth (The 4400)|"Rebirth" (The 4400)]], an episode of the science fiction television series ''The 4400'' * [[Rebirth (newspaper)]], a short-lived hippie underground newspaper in Phoenix, Arizona * ''[[Green Lantern: Rebirth]]'', a comic book series * ''[[The Flash: Rebirth]]'', a comic book series * ''[[Tales of Rebirth]]'', a 2004 video game * ''[[.hack//G.U. Volume 1: Rebirth]]'', a 2006 video game * "Rebirth," a [[List of Batman Beyond episodes|''Batman Beyond'' episode]] * [[Mortal Kombat: Rebirth]] ==See also== * [[Past life (disambiguation)]] * [[Past lives (disambiguation)]] * [[Reincarnation (disambiguation)]] * [[Rebirthing (disambiguation)]] * [[Born again (disambiguation)]] * [[New Birth (disambiguation)]] * [[Renaissance]], the cultural phenomenon whose names translates as "to be reborn" {{disambig}}
